body_html:
I can see how the device name and type list can be pulled out of some bazel rule (using the 'native.' extensions).

I'm not sure how to set up a bazel rule that depends on another rule that may not exist. I wouldn't like to have to modify a file in the repo in order to enable plugin support. if I was going to do that then I might as well just add my device in the same way as the GPU one is.

I will investigate optional dependencies in bazel to see if that is a thing.
